item.title: Andrew Poelstra - Secure Signatures (2019-03-09)
item.description: Name: Andrew Poelstra Topic: Secure Signatures - Harder Than You Think Location: MIT Bitcoin Expo 2019 Date: March 9th 2019 Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0gc1DSk8wlw Twitter announcement: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1104399812147916800 Transcript completed by: Bryan Bishop Edited by: Michael Folkson Introduction Hi everyone. Can you hear me alright? Is my mic? Okay, cool. I was scheduled to talk about the history of Schnorr signatures in Bitcoin. I wanted to do that but then I realized I’ve only got 20-30 minutes to talk here.

item.title: Andrew Poelstra - Threshold Signatures And Accountability (2019-02-04)
item.description: Name: Andrew Poelstra Topic: Threshold Signatures and Accountability Location: SF Bitcoin Devs Date: February 4th 2019 Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j9Wvz7zI_Ac Slides: https://download.wpsoftware.net/bitcoin/wizardry/2019-02-sfdevs-threshold/slides.pdf Transcript completed by: Bryan Bishop Edited by: Michael Folkson Twitter announcement: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1092665108960968704 Introduction (Mark Erhardt) Sorry for the delays. We’re finally ready to talk. Welcome to our talk. We’d like to thank our sponsors including Blockstream and Digital Garage. Today we have Andrew Poelstra to talk about threshold signatures and accountability.
